ygData.messageBody:
to sum it up - word wrap...
if you look, the "pic" on the next line is actually the finish to 'topic'
from the line above.
simple click on the link, wait for error, then edit your address and put
'pic' on the end , to make it

"...topicID=4592.topic"
and yeah, the thread is still there :)

MacGrough Mich'Rathe
